intro: Origanum rotundifolium, commonly known as winter savory, is a perennial herb native to the Mediterranean region. It features small, pink to violet flowers and oval, slightly rounded leaves that give it its species name. The plant thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it suitable for rock gardens and borders. Its aromatic leaves and flowers are used in cooking and traditional medicine. Winter savory is also valued for its ability to attract beneficial insects to the garden.
